projects.title: Projects

projects.untitled_description: A new project ready to be edited.

home_intro.title: Build, manage, and ship Phaser projects in one place.
home_intro.description: SparkX brings together project management, asset collaboration, versioned editing, and AI-assisted workflows for modern game production.

project_intro.not_found_desc: This project does not exist on this device, or it has been deleted.
project_intro.no_description: Add a short description to introduce your project.
project_intro.about_body_1: This page is the project overview (root).
project_intro.about_body_2: Use it to describe goals, references, and how the project is organized.
project_intro.about_body_3: Open the editor to start creating assets and scenes.

chat.title: Generate a 3-view character sheet
chat.generating_pose_intro: Now I'll generate the character's neutral battle stance (standing straight with arms down):
chat.done_message: Done! I've generated the character's neutral battle stance, with arms naturally down, showing a stable standing posture.
chat.followup_message: I'll generate a 3-view sheet for this character in a neutral battle stance, with a white background.
